Content: The experience of in ship-crews should be tracked via its members, so
there are different members with different levels (So 10 lvl. 1
members, 15 lvl. 2 members and so on, their average giving the
crews-experience level) and if the whole crew gets 50 experience
points, 50 crewmember level up. This level-up is split equally between
the different level groups, with the remainder of the division being
applied to the lowest level-grpup firtst, and the highest level not
